page.title: 07CALLOOSE CARAVAN PARK
page.content: The Caravan Park,owned by Mr.and Mrs. Gardener,opens in April or at Easter depending which comes first,until the end of October.They have 12 static caravans and 107 touring pitches for tents,caravans and caravanettes.It costs Â£159.00 maximum for a week in a luxury static caravan and Â£4.00 a night for a touring pitch and 50p for any extras. They have a bathroom for the disabled which has a toilet,washbasin and shower.They also have normal toilets. There is a laundry with a washing machine,spin-dryer,tumble-dryer and an iron and ironing-board. There is a shop which sells food and drinks,sweets,toys and everything you need for camping.
